abort.single_instance_allowed: Only one instance of watchman is allowed

error.invalid_included_folders: included_folders should be a comma separated list of configuration folders
error.invalid_columns_width: columns_width should be a list of 3 positive integers
error.malformed_json: service data should be a valid json dictionary

data.chunk_size: Message chunk size in bytes (used with notification service)
data.columns_width: List of report columns width, e.g. 30, 7, 60
data.startup_delay: Startup delay for watchman sensors initialization
data.friendly_names: Add friendly names to the report

data_description.service_data: JSON object with notification service data, see documentation for details
data_description.included_folders: Comma-separated list of folders where watchman should look for config files
data_description.ignored_items: Comma-separated list of entities and services excluded from tracking
data_description.ignored_states: Comma-separated list of the states excluded from tracking
data_description.ignored_files: Comma-separated list of config files excluded from tracking
